text: Beware of the threats to universal healthcare in Lebanon! 🚨💡 Social security contributions and national institution budgets are losing value, while draft bills for universal coverage stall in parliament. 🤔👀 Privatization looms, threatening the NSSF's role as main insurer of private sector workers. 💰🏥 Political parties are pushing private initiatives, but can they ensure sustainable coverage for all? 🤷‍♂️👫 Let's keep the focus on strengthening social security institutions to achieve true universal healthcare! 💪🏼🧡
